WrapperSPP.py - wrap spp peak caller¶

Author:Andreas Heger
Release:$Id$
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python

Purpose¶

Runs the spp peak caller.

The workflow follows the tutorial at:

http://compbio.med.harvard.edu/Supplements/ChIP-seq/tutorial.html

Usage¶

Documentation¶

Code¶

WrapperSPP.bamToBed(infile, outfile)¶

convert bam to bed with bedtools.

class WrapperSPP.ZinbaPeak¶

Bases: tuple

ZinbaPeak(contig, unrefined_start, unrefined_end, strand, posterior, summit, height, refined_start, refined_end, median, fdr)

contig¶

Alias for field number 0

count(value) → integer -- return number of occurrences of value¶
fdr¶

Alias for field number 10

height¶

Alias for field number 6

index(value[, start[, stop]]) → integer -- return first index of value.¶

Raises ValueError if the value is not present.

Alias for field number 9

Alias for field number 4

Alias for field number 8

iterate of zinba peaks in infile.

script main.

parses command line options in sys.argv, unless argv is given.
